META_DESCRIPTION: FastComments delivers your comments and media from the edge with our own global CDN and DNS infrastructure for maximum privacy and performance.
HERO_DESCRIPTION: Your comments and media delivered from the edge, powered by our own CDN and DNS infrastructure. No third-party tracking, maximum performance, complete privacy.
GLOBAL_NETWORK_SUBTITLE: FastComments operates its own global infrastructure with edge locations worldwide, ensuring your comments and media are delivered with lightning speed and complete privacy.
BENEFIT_PRIVACY_TEXT: We host our own CDN and DNS infrastructure. No third-party tracking, no data sharing with external CDN providers. Your users' privacy is protected.
BENEFIT_PERFORMANCE_TEXT: Comments and media served from the nearest edge location to your users. Faster loading times mean better user experience and engagement.
BENEFIT_RELIABILITY_TEXT: Multiple failover systems and redundant infrastructure ensure your comments are always available, no matter what.
BENEFIT_SECURITY_TEXT: On-disk encryption, DDoS protection, and security monitoring across all edge locations protect your community.
TECH_SELF_HOSTED_CDN_DESC: Complete control over content delivery. No third-party CDN providers means no external tracking or data sharing.
TECH_GLOBAL_DNS_DESC: Our own DNS infrastructure with global routing ensures fast resolution times worldwide.
TECH_EDGE_COMPUTING_DESC: Comments are processed and cached at the edge, reducing server round trips and improving response times.
TECH_SMART_CACHING_DESC: Intelligent caching strategies optimize performance while ensuring real-time comment updates and live conversations.
TECH_AUTO_FAILOVER_DESC: Multi-layer redundancy with automatic failover systems ensure continuous availability even during outages.
TECH_MONITORING_DESC: 24/7 monitoring of all edge locations with automated alerts and proactive issue resolution.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Join thousands of websites already benefiting from our global infrastructure.
